2007-01-19

From the heart or from the diaphragm


Belting it out
(originally uploaded by ccompanick)

Britta's voice is normally a hushed, sexy, chocolate-coated snog of a voice but on "You Turned Your Head Around" from Dean & Britta's upcoming album Back Numbers she gets to flex those vocal muscles into something less familiar - it's nice to hear that. Aquarium drunkard has an mp3 to illustrate my point.
